content: @Grahame Grieve https://blog.google/topics/google-cloud/google-cloud-himss-engaging-healthcare-and-health-it-community can we get search working on the spec pages now?
well, we had to abandon google search for 2 reasons - advertising, and blocked in several countries.

the HL7 server is running solr and cold fusion, and so I meant to get around to implementing search on that - which would be much better, since the search would know something about the spec. E.g. choose to search on vocab, elements, narrative, mappings etc.
but learning coldfusion + solr is a little more arcane than I expected.
I don't know if anyone with coldfusion experience wants to volunteer to help...
@gg could and IG implement google search?
Well if Google are in an generous mood, how about https://enterprise.google.com/search/
